website_summaries.verdict: A rich, firming cream that moisturizes and softens skin.
pros: Recommended by medical and skincare professionals
Softens skin and reduces the appearance of lines and crepey texture
Absorbs quickly and doesn't feel oily
A little goes a long way
cons: May not produce results for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Recommend It More Highly
customer_reviews.text: I'm 67 and gifted with almost wrinkle-free skin. Oh,I WORK at it, but I would be lying if I didn't say it looks good. BUT I have that (arg!) turkey neck that has made me sadly allergic to taking photos. Last week, I took my FIRST full on selfie that i was proud enough to share. That was after one bottle of the Advanced. Just started on my 2nd. I cannot recommend it more highly. Note: After applying,I firmly pat, with the back of my hand, the area under my chin 3 dozen times...pat,pat,pat,etc.
customer_reviews.author: LA Aikin

customer_reviews.title: You need to give it anywhere from one month to six weeks to see results. Take a picture of your neck before you start.
customer_reviews.text: I like the pump packaging. I also like that it works. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: arlene p.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a moisturizer. I feel like any good moisturizer would do the same thing but this does for a quarter of the price. There’s nothing magical about this, I think people just tend to use it more religiously because of having paid more for it. If we ladies would be as rigorous with our regular moisturizers I do believe we would have the same results.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: I started using this item per my dermatologist’s recommendation. After the first bottle I have noticed a big difference in the appearance of the crepe skin on my neck. Pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with results!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 4 months after my dermatologist recommended it. I am extremely pleased with the results. I have tried other products and have never reordered until this product. I use morning and night religiously! Skin is plumper and lines are hardly noticeable now. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nee Nee

customer_reviews.title: Great for crepiness
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck cream! It doesn’t get rid of lines but it does reduce the crepiness. I use twice day over serum and I Apply in an upward motion.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for your eyes !
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this to me. It has been the Only cream I’ve used to help plum Up my sunken eyes. Also helps brighten the circles a little and keeps under eye skin hydrated! I am now on my third bottle but originally noticed results within 2-3 weeks !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nectifirm is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended by my cosmetologist. It does work very well. Has helped the tightness in my neck for sure. I will continue to repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E.

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my doctor - so far so good I see a difference - not greasy and a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: M3

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product on my neck for about 7 weeks. I have seen no improvement what-so-ever! I will not be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this product to me. Results are subtle but visible. I will re-purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: Used religiously. Like the feel of the lotion but firming of neck was not visible.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: recommended by a friend who received this product from a dermatologist and already seeing the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: This product did absolutely nothing- it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ms JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my 2nd bottle. Makes a difference - subtle - yet so much more moisturized
customer_reviews.author: C Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as Revision Product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the same product as ordering from the original Revision Site...Will Not Purchase Again!
customer_reviews.author: S Winebarger

customer_reviews.title: No result
customer_reviews.text: I used it as the instructions recommended. I didn't see any changes in my skin appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Torr4

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 6 months. I feel that it has given my neck a smoother appearance. it is expensive, but cheaper than a face lift. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Krech

customer_reviews.title: It's like Magic
customer_reviews.text: If you remember to apply one squirt morning and night, it really does firm up under your chin. I'm trying it on my upper arms now too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tropoli

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love Revision products!! You have to be realistic - this isn't surgery, it is a product you put on your skin. It works if you use it...every.single.day.
customer_reviews.author: hear it live

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I quess for the money I was hoping for more results
customer_reviews.author: sewgirl

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Revision products (just the basics) for a year now with great results so I shared it with my sister who owns a working farm, wears no makeup, and is always in the weather. Her skin was dry and she had a perpetual red nose and chin. After sending her the Revision basics and she used them daily, we both saw a dramatic improvement in a matter of weeks.....I think her skin was dry and starving! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as before, and totally overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Revision neck cream off and on for about 10 years. I used many others but Revision was always my favorite. However, when they changed the container from a jar to a bottle, the formula changed as well and it's definitely not as good as before. On top of that, the price jumped somewhere from $60 to $133?!?! That's too high for this quality. I think it's still more effective than most neck creams on the market but I'm moving onto my second favorite, Sisley...
customer_reviews.author: TKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Removes Tissue Paper Skin Texture
customer_reviews.text: Prior to using this I would only moisturize once daily with SPF46 lotion on my neck and decolletage and I have recently been having the tissue paper skin texture on my decolletage, mostly on the area that the sun frequently hits. NECTIFIRM is to be used twice a day. I use 3 pumps for all sides of my neck and my decolletage morning and night. I use SPF46 on top afterwards (I have not found a higher SPF product that works well with my sensitive skin). NECTIFIRM has given my skin a smooth flat plumped up appearance. This is a new staple in my skincare routine. Rating 5 stars = Love It.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineMM

customer_reviews.title: One of the things I don't really like is the smell
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a week now and I haven't really seen any results yet. One of the things I don't really like is the smell, it isn't the most pleasant smell but it isn't the worse smell I have smelled either. I was actually hoping this would be unscented. I do like that it absorbs quickly doesn't leave any oily residue behind. I like the pump, it makes it easy to use. Just use two pumps and apply in an upward motion which is easy enough. I hope to see more results as I continue to use it. It doesn't irritate my skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling soft!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for three weeks now. I can't honestly say that I have seen an improvement in the look or feel of the skin on my neck and/or décolletage (I'm 50+), but I do really like the cream. Two measured pumps is enough to cover my entire neck and chest area. The cream absorbs quickly and leaves my skin soft and not at all greasy. I can get dressed right away and the cream doesn't transfer to the neck of my blouse or dress. There is no noticeable scent so it doesn't compete with my perfume. Overall, this will likely be a repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: May not eliminate wrinkles but moisturizes and improves skin texture
customer_reviews.text: I have been using on my neck and decolletage for several weeks. I like having the dedicated cream because I tend to use it more and pay more attention to moisturizing that area. The sleek black pump works well. I use 2-3 pumps per night. It is not greasy and quickly. I will say I do not see any fewer lines than what I had before, but it is good for your skin to be hydrated to prevent further aging. I will continue to use and am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I (don’t totally) Hate My Neck
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this firming neck cream for a few weeks and I can honestly say I’ve noticed a huge difference. I’ve been battling the 40-something neck wrinkles and sagging Nora Ephron hilariously wrote about in her book, I Hate My Neck. This lotion goes on easily, absorbing quickly and leaving no greasy residue. My only negative is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mentally in Paris

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks noticeably smoother
customer_reviews.text: So I am always searching for those products that will make my skin look better. I know miracles can't happen, but I want my skin to look its best. I was happy to find this product. Why I like this product: * My neck looks noticeably smoother after only a few applications. * The light smell. So many products are ruined by a strong, unpleasant and artificial smell. * It goes on easy and is not greasy. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: After two months, I've seen no results.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about two months now. Pros: 1. It isn't greasy 2. It absorbs well and quickly 3. It seems to be a good moisturizer. Cons: 1. I have yet to see any noticeable difference in my skin. So, I really can't recommend it to help with the look of aging skin, but as a general moisturizer, it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Beanomly

customer_reviews.title: My Wife: No results after the first two weeks, but possibly maybe a month of usage?
customer_reviews.text: My wife is the main person who uses this skincare product. She felt this worked like a moisturizing cream, hasn't seen results after two weeks but perhaps wondered if it was a product that one must use repeatedly for a month straight (so you would need more than one) to see the results. No skin irritation when using the product. It doesn't stain clothing, nor does it run down to her clothing. A slight scent but for the most part, the two pumps should last several weeks to a month. But she likes the product, she's just waiting for results.
customer_reviews.author: KNDY

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from my dermatologist. What a dissapointment. It was the equivalent of using water. It did absolutely nothing for me. What a hoax.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: feels great
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this cream. It is soft but not too greasy and goes on smoothly. I don't have a lot of problems with neck wrinkling yet, so hopefully this nice lotion will help keep them at bay!
customer_reviews.author: informednow

customer_reviews.title: Hack it for your elbows!
customer_reviews.text: This has done zero for my chest or neck but I have been using it on my elbows as well and have quite noticeable results. They look less rough and much smoother.
customer_reviews.author: StyleSnob

customer_reviews.title: Looking For Smoother Skin
customer_reviews.text: It is sometimes difficult to rate a skin product with only a week’s worth of use. I have used this diligently,and even though I do not see improvement yet, I like the way my skin feels. This product has a light scent that is quite acceptable. It is light in consistency and goes onto my neck and décolletage easily. The lines and wrinkles are still there and probably will be. I am looking for someth8ng that smooths my skin slightly and so far this feels good, and everyday I look for a difference. I like the fact that a Dermatologist recommended this product to a reviewer. It gives the product more weight. Recommended. prisrob 05-20-18
customer_reviews.author: prisrob

customer_reviews.title: I love that this product is made with high quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is made with high quality ingredients. It goes on smoothly and feels very moisturizing with out leaving a sticky of filmy feel. I did see subtle changes with it, but time will tell if they increase significantly over time
customer_reviews.author: LOL

customer_reviews.title: The Jury is Still Out
customer_reviews.text: I may have not been using this product long enough to see results. But for the price, I expected better results. I will finish the rest of the bottle to see what comes of it. Besides that, the cream has a pleasant smell to it. I've never seen anything with a such an extensive ingredients list to include but not limited to water, glycerin, alcohol, coconut, acids and dipeptide
customer_reviews.author: Ymjauthor

product_meta.title: Revision Skincare Nectifirm Advanced Neck Firming Cream, 1.7 oz
product_meta.description:
This neck cream brightens and minimizes the appearance of imperfections, fine lines and wrinkles, while it restores elasticity and smoothes skin. It hydrates and boost up collagen for youthful looking skin.

BRAND STORY
For more than 30 years, Revision Skincare has provided dermatologists, plastic surgeons and estheticians with clinically-proven, highly advanced offerings for skin health and longevity. Made in the U.S.A.
